pipegoggles.configuration.client.auto_mo: If true, the auto mode only works when you are crouching.
pipegoggles.configuration.client.scan_ra: If enabled the scan will be performed radially around the player. Otherwise it will scan rectangular.
pipegoggles.configuration.client.scan_re: The refresh rate of the scan for nearby cables in ticks.
pipegoggles.configuration.client.show_he: Show help tooltips in the GUI.
pipegoggles.configuration.rules.energy_p: The amount of energy consumed per active color.
The amount of energy consumed per range.
pipegoggles.configuration.rules.max_ener: The maximum amount of energy a Pipe Goggle can store.
The maximum amount of energy a Pipe Goggle can receive per tick.
pipegoggles.configuration.rules.range_op: The available range options for Pipe Goggles. This list should have at least 2 values, one being the minimum range and the other being the maximum range.
pipegoggles.configuration.rules.require_: If enabled Pipe Goggles require energy to operate.
pipegoggles.help.insert_items: Insert items from the mod you want to see through the goggles
pipegoggles.help.keep_powered: Keep the goggles powered with FE to maintain their functionality
pipegoggles.help.set_range: Set the range of the goggles
pipegoggles.message.always_on: The goggles always show all enabled colors.
pipegoggles.message.auto_mode: Only enabled colors matching the item in your hand will be shown.
pipegoggles.message.fabulous_warning: Pipe Goggles do not work when it's raining with fabulous graphics!
